content:
Deities @Compendium[pf2e.deities.Atreia]{Atreia}, @Compendium[pf2e.deities.Chohar]{Chohar}, @Compendium[pf2e.deities.Hathor]{Hathor}, @Compendium[pf2e.deities.Horus]{Horus}, @Compendium[pf2e.deities.Jaidi]{Jaidi}, @Compendium[pf2e.deities.Luhar]{Luhar}, @Compendium[pf2e.deities.Nurgal]{Nurgal}, @Compendium[pf2e.deities.Ra]{Ra}, @Compendium[pf2e.deities.Sarenrae]{Sarenrae}, @Compendium[pf2e.deities.Shizuru]{Shizuru}, @Compendium[pf2e.deities.Sturovenen]{Sturovenen}, @Compendium[pf2e.deities.The Path of the Heavens]{The Path of the Heavens}, @Compendium[pf2e.deities.The Prismatic Ray]{The Prismatic Ray}, @Compendium[pf2e.deities.Tlehar]{Tlehar}, @Compendium[pf2e.deities.Walkena]{Walkena}

Domain Spell @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.Dazzling Flash]{Dazzling Flash}; Advanced Domain Spell @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.Positive Luminance]{Positive Luminance}

You harness the power of the sun and other light sources, and punish undead.
name: Sun Domain
